name: Wintry Latency
description:
Play it on Newgrounds for online scoreboard and medals.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

And so, she found herself in an snowy surface... With hostiles! Sweep away your enemies with your deadly punch and complete all the waves in Wintry Latency. Can you reach the top of the ranking?

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Note:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The project started in January 11, 2019. I usually prefer to program from the lowest logical level possible, but at the same time creating games without an engine is quite tiring.

So I found a compromise: 
game creation = engine;
software creation = libraries.

GML better reflects my needs and here it is my entry. As always, feel free to comment / rate and PM me for anything! Enjoy!
